alert.note: Alert for Orange County Coastal; Orange County Inland; San Diego County Coastal Areas; Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued January 30 at 9:33PM PST until February 01 at 4:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts to 40 to 50 mph possible. * WHERE...San Diego County Coastal Areas, Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills, Orange County Coastal Areas, and Orange County Inland Areas. * WHEN...4 AM through 4 PM Thursday. * IMPACTS...Strong winds could damage trees and other objects. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strongest winds will occur in the vicinity of the cold front, when brief gusts in excess of 50 mph could occur, especially at the coast.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Orange County Coastal; Orange County Inland; San Diego County Coastal Areas; Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills
